entries.title: Help URL
entries.description: URL to the manual. If empty, it links to the latest manual from BEXIS2

entries.title: DataCite DOI Placeholders
entries.description: These placeholders will be replaced automatically.

entries.title: DataCite DOI Mappings
entries.description: There are additional mappings for DOI DataCite.

entries.title: gbifCollectionArea
entries.description: All created darwin core archive dataset exports are saved in this specified directory. It starts from the predifiend Data folder as default. It is also possible to specify a sequential folder path. default: {Data}/export/gbif
